body.name: Clementine Fox and the Great Island Adventure: A Graphic Novel (Clementine Fox #1)
body.merchantInfo: Ships from and sold by ThriftBooks-Atlanta.
editorialReviews: Editorial Reviews Review Praise for Clementine Fox:"Winsome adventures in friendship, magic, and hands-on visual learning." -- Kirkus Reviews"Warm colors provide a welcoming feel, animated facial expressions add verve, and themes of communal care, friendship, and overcoming obstacles permeate this gently humorous narrative." -- Publishers Weekly About the Author Leigh Luna is a mixed Latina artist who was born in Albuquerque, New Mexico, and graduated from the Minneapolis College of Art and Design. In addition to making comics, she has worked in animation as a color designer on shows such as Steven Universe and Centaurworld. Her client list includes Cartoon Network, Nickelodeon, Disney/Hyperion, Target, AV Club, and BuzzFeed.Leigh is passionate about color, comedy, and alternative learning. She lives in Los Angeles. Visit her online at leighlunacomics.com.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 18 hrs 47 mins
body.description: Meet Clementine Fox, Professional Amateur Adventurer!Clementine is supposed to be on her way to school... but why not go out for a day of adventure and exploration instead? She recruits her friends Nubbins Squirrel and Penelope Rabbit and heads to the beach, where Jesse Otter is preparing to take his giant Turtle, Annabella, to a mysterious local island. Clementine’s great-aunt Marnie lives there -- far away from math tests and tutors -- so Clementine and her friends hitch a ride to the island as stowaways. What could go wrong?This is Leigh Luna’s funny and charming debut graphic novel about a group of young animals who set out on an adventure and learn the true value of friendship, family, and what it means to stick together and work things out! Read more

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My kids loved
reviews.reviewText: Both my 7 and 10 year old loved and belly laughed! Great book. Can't wait for the next one.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for kids
reviews.reviewText: I read this to my 7 year old nephew, and he loved it! Great story, and we can’t wait for the sequel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great artwork, great fun!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Review on Condition of Product, Not Actual Story
reviews.reviewText: Book was purchased as a gift and arrived late with water damage to the cover and several pages that were stuck together. Box had no obvious water damage so it appears it was packaged this way. Disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Such a fun read for all ages!
reviews.reviewText: This book is heartwarming, entertaining and full of fun for the whole family. It's a great read for comic lovers and children that love animals. The perfect gift for a young adventurer!
